text: Arau e'ito e'i babe'o ye, yisakalaka jnana diya haiche sihamte yena janiba parae ye, e'ito tomara pratipalakara taraphara paraa praeraita satya; phalata sihamte iyara oparata bisbasa sthapana karae arau sihamtara antara iyara prati binayaranata haya. Niscaya yisakale imana aniche allahe te'omlokaka sarala patha dekhuraaba
